item.title: How to Calculate the Number of Views
item.description: How to Calculate the Number of Views Busuanzi is a third-party visitor counter and statistics tool that you can use with Hugo to track visitor traffic to your site. Here’s how to set up Busuanzi in Hugo: First, go to the Busuanzi website (https://busuanzi.ibruce.info/) and choose the style of the visitor counter you want to use. You can choose from several different styles and customize the text that appears alongside the counter.
